root.title: 36 Jalbak-Tash XI
root.place: The inscription is among the inscriptions marked as Jalbak-Tash from III to XIII on so called Jalbak-Tash, Plane I, the top group. Judging by location, Kyzlasov assumes that the inscription appeared on the rock later than all other neighboring inscriptions above III-VII and beside X, but earlier than the inscription IX.
root.general: Орналасуына қарап, И.Л.Кызласов III-VII және қасындағы X жазбадан кейін, бірақ IX жазбадан бұрын қашалған деп тұжырымдайды. Жазбаны құрайтын 2 үлкен анық қашалған таңба тігінен жазылған.
root.description: 2 big, clear and tight traced vertically signs make up a line.
root.size: Length of line 3 cm, height of signs is 2.8-3 cm.
root.investigation: Nadeliyaev mentioned the inscriptions IX and XI shortly and their bad integrity 516 580. The first interpretation and translation, and copy of the inscriptions were published by Kyzlasov in 2001 579. Publications: Kubarev 581, Kyzlasov 517, Kocheev 523.
